verses.verse: Blessed<WH835> is he that considers<WH7919> the poor<WH1800>: the Lord<WH3068> will deliver<WH4422> him in time<WH3117> of trouble<WH7451>.

The Lord<WH3068> will preserve<WH8104> him<WH2421>, and keep him alive; and he shall be blessed<WH833> upon the earth<WH776>: and you will not deliver<WH5414> him unto the will<WH5315> of his enemies<WH341>.
The Lord<WH3068> will strengthen<WH5582> him upon the bed<WH6210> of languishing<WH1741>: you will make<WH2015> all his bed<WH4904> in his sickness<WH2483>.
I said<WH559>, Lord<WH3068>, be merciful<WH2603> unto me<WH7495>: heal my soul<WH5315>; for I have sinned against you<WH2398>.
My enemies<WH341> speak<WH559> evil<WH7451> of me<WH4191>, When shall he die, and his name<WH8034> perish<WH6>?
And if he come<WH935> to see<WH7200> me<WH1696>, he speaks vanity<WH7723>: his heart<WH3820> gathers<WH6908> iniquity<WH205> to itself<WH3318>; when he goes abroad<WH2351>, he tells it<WH1696>.
All that hate<WH8130> me whisper<WH3907> together<WH3162> against me<WH2803>: against me do they devise my hurt<WH7451>.
A evil<WH1100> disease<WH1697>, say they<WH3332>, cleaves fast unto him<WH7901>: and now that he lies he shall rise up<WH6965> no more<WH3254>.
Yes<WH7965>, my own familiar friend<WH376>, in whom I trusted<WH982>, which did eat<WH398> of my bread<WH3899>, has lifted up<WH1431> his heel against me<WH6119>.
But you<WH3068>, O Lord, be merciful<WH2603> unto me<WH6965>, and raise me up, that I may requite them<WH7999>.
By this I know<WH3045> that you favor<WH2654> me<WH341>, because my enemy does not triumph over me<WH7321>.
And as for me<WH8551>, you uphold me in my integrity<WH8537>, and set<WH5324> me before your face<WH6440> for ever<WH5769>.
Blessed<WH1288> be the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478> from everlasting<WH5769>, and to everlasting<WH5769>. Amen<WH543>, and Amen<WH543>.
